title: Coding Club
desc: For programmers, hackathons, and weekly coding challenges. All skill levels are welcome.

title: Web Club
desc: Dedicated to web development, modern frameworks, accessibility, and creative design.

title: Robotics Club
desc: Build, program, and compete with robots. Hands-on projects in automation and hardware.

title: UI/UX Design Circle
desc: Focuses on user-centric design, prototyping, and creating beautiful, intuitive interfaces.

title: AI & Machine Learning Group
desc: Explore the frontiers of artificial intelligence, from neural networks to data science projects.

title: Cybersecurity Sentinels
desc: Learn about ethical hacking, network security, and digital forensics in a collaborative environment.

title: Game Development Guild
desc: Join fellow creators to design, develop, and launch your own video games.

title: Entrepreneurship Hub
desc: Connect with innovators, develop business plans, and get your startup ideas off the ground.

title: Photography Collective
desc: For photographers of all levels. Join us for photo walks, workshops, and gallery showcases.

title: Public Speaking Society
desc: Build confidence and master the art of oration through practice, workshops, and friendly competitions.
